Name: Capital Simulator
About the game: This game is dedicated to players who like investment and economics as much as I do. In Capital Simulator, as the company's CEO, you need to plan and optimize your product industry chain among many product types, research product technology, and respond to challenges from other companies. Main Features: Make important business decisions in all areas including retail, manufacturing, agriculture, mining and real estate development. Use many product types to build an industrial chain, optimize your industrial chain based on distance, capacity and other information to get the best results. Technology research and development to achieve quality suppression. Respond to the challenges posed by other listed companies and trade their stocks to make quick profits or make long-term investments. Or merge the company to obtain its assets and technologyã€‚ Respond to various incidents that occur randomly.
